titleStmt.title: A character of Charles the Second, written by an impartial hand and exposed to publick view for information of the people.
titleStmt.author: Tuke, Samuel, Sir, Colonel.

notesStmt.note: The author is not to be confused with Sir Samuel Tuke, d. 1674. Cf. Brit. Mus. Cat.
Full-page illustration of royal arms on p. [2].
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
